Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I install Android on my non-Android device?  I have searched (hopefully well enough!) on the internet to see if we can load Android on the LG Arena KM 900.Though there was this forum which kind of talked about it, it was still not clear as to how to do it.http://androidarena.pytalhost.net/index.php?page=Thread&threadID=76&pageNo=6&s=12839d124f983ac19ea9e43226073557b26abf3fHas any one tried this?Appreciate the time taken to answer my query.
Title: Can I boot Android on the LG Arena KM 900?

history.Text: I have searched (hopefully well enough!) on the internet to see if we can load Android on the LG Arena KM 900. Unfortunately, I couldn't associate this with the Arena tag since I'm new here!Though there was this forum which kind of talked about it, it was still not clear as to how to do it.http://androidarena.pytalhost.net/index.php?page=Thread&threadID=76&pageNo=6&s=12839d124f983ac19ea9e43226073557b26abf3fHas any one tried this?Appreciate the time taken to answer my query.ThanksSoni
